Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On the second maternally inherited allele , we identified the common infantile disease - causing 4 - bp insertion , + TATC 1278 , in exon 11 .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| common infantile disease |
| 4-bp insertion |
| + TATC 1278 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| common infantile disease (4-bp insertion, + TATC 1278) |

Explanation:
The original paragraph mentions "common infantile disease" and provides more details about the specific genetic mutation causing the disease, which are "4-bp insertion" and "+ TATC 1278". Therefore, these two entities are also part of the disease and should be included in the table as well.
